message.subject: Contract status needed
message.content:
M1.1. On Monday we have to file a "transition plan" with Louise Kitchen for NETCO.
[Inform: on Monday Bob and recipients have to file a transition plan with Louise for NETCO]
M1.2. She wants details.
[Inform: Louise wants details]
M1.3. On that note I need a status report from each desk on our effort to start the contract process for pipes, TPA's & EBB's so I can include that in the report. [Y]
[Inform: Bob needs status reports from each desk on effort to start contract process to include in transition plan]
Sflink1.3
M1.4. I have received some emails however I would like each manager to put together a summary in an Excel spreadsheet that we can have Suzanne consolidate with the stuff she already put together. [Y]
[Inform: even though Bob received some emails he would like an Excel spreadsheet created that Suzanne can consolidate with her information]
Sflink1.4
M1.5. Please cover the key items listed in the earlier email. [Y]
[Request-Action: cover key items listed in earlier email]
Flink1.5
M1.6. Also we should be getting as much hard copy as possible so we can proceed with our goal of preparing for a startup.
[Inform: they should also get plenty of hard copy to prepare for a startup]
Sflink1.6
M1.7. I suggest reviewing the paperwork and identify the stuff that you will need to get the forms completed.
[Inform: Bob thinks recipients should review paperwork in order to complete forms]
M1.8. No doubt we will have substantial gaps but as long as we know where and what they are we can get the proper internal people involved (legal, credit, etc.)
[Inform: despite gaps, as long as everyone is aware of them, they can get necessary people involved]
M1.10. Tks - Bob
[Conventional: thanks, signature]

message.subject: Contract status needed
message.content:
M2.1. This is what we've got so far.
[Inform: presumably attached document(s) are what Daren et al. have so far]
Blink1.3
Blink1.4
M2.2. Due to our agency activity on Lone Star, I do not want to contact them yet.
[Inform: Daren does not want to contact Lone Star yet]
M2.3. But, I have a copy of a contract they sent me a couple of months ago we can use.
[Inform: Daren has a copy of an old contract that can be used]
Blink1.6
M2.4. D
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Contract status needed
message.content:
M3.1. Bob,
[Conventional: salutation]
M3.2. Who is collecting the hard copies or e-mails of contracts?
[Request-Information: who is collecting hard copies or emails of contracts]
Blink1.6
Flink3.2
M3.3. I've got the Guadalupe contracts now.
[Inform: Daren currently has Guadalupe contracts]
Sflink3.3
M3.4. D
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Contract status needed
message.content:
M4.1. Daren,
[Conventional: salutation]
M4.2. please forward to Suzanne Calcagno, [Y]
[Request-Action: forward to Suzanne]
Blink3.3
M4.3. she sits near me on 5
[Inform: Suzanne's office is near Bob's]
M4.4. Tks - Bob
[Conventional: thanks, signature]

message.subject: Contract status needed
message.content:
M5.1. fyi
